Influencer Marketing Mother’s Day Campaign for Bouquet Bar

Google paid search and shopping ads are important to driving revenue and staying ahead of, and quite literally on top, of your competition. With billions of searches per day on Google, your brand can utilize search ads to make sure sure your customers not only notice you, but take action.

Google shopping allows customers to search, view, and compare products from different sellers. Customers can easily see a side by side comparison of the prices of those sellers.

It is no secret that video has gone from an option to a necessity in recent years. YouTube is the second largest search engine in the world, which means your brand needs to be here. In the past, YouTube was seen as a brand awareness channel, but in recent times has become so much more. With detailed targeting, and a variety of ad types, YouTube is here to stay.
